name: Bastet
description: Bastet, the black cat guardian of homes, embodies elegance and mystery.

skills.name: Nile Dance
skills.description: Bastet gracefully leaps toward the position of the enemy with the highest ATK, dealing DMG equal to 160% of ATK to enemies around her each time she lands.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per hit to 180% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG per instance to 200% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Removes the cooldown of Feline Agility during the skill.

skills.name: Bastetâ€™s Spin
skills.description: Bastet spins her body and strikes nearby enemies 3 times, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK per strike and reducing their Hit Rate by 15% for 5s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per hit to 110% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Reduces the Hit Rate of hit enemies by 20%.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per hit to 120% of ATK.

skills.name: Furball
skills.description: Creates orbs that orbit Bastet for 15s, dealing DMG equal to 42% of ATK per second to nearby enemies.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 50% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 60% of ATK.

skills.name: Feline Agility
skills.description: When Bastet takes a single hit dealing DMG exceeding 10% of her max HP, she becomes immune to the DMG and gains 30% Dodge Rate for 6s. Can trigger once every 15s.

relic.name: Feline Celerity
relic.description: Gains 25% Dodge Rate when HP drops below 50%.

upgrades.level2: When dodging a hit, deals 100% ATK as DMG to the attacker.
upgrades.level3: Gains 35% Dodge Rate when HP drops below 50%.
upgrades.level4: When dodging a hit, deals 200% ATK as DMG to the attacker.
